section.p: A low prow emerges from a bank of mist close off your starboard bow. As the vessel takes shape, you recognize the bronze shields along the sides that identify it as a slave ship from Uttaku. It heaves ponderously closer - powered, not by sails, but by huge paddles turned by oxen chained in the bowels of the ship.
‘Normally we could hope to outrun them,’ announces the helmsman. ‘But they’ve come on us right close, and there’s hardly a breath of wind for the sails. We’ll have to stand and fight.’

choices.choice: Go alongside and prepare to board
